text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Good job, trainer! You are working hard every day.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: By the way… it's finally that time of year again!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: It's almost time for the annual "Summer Camp" at Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: This is a different kind of training, where you stay overnight at the facility…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: I'm sure your horse girl will grow even more than usual!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: … So please make sure she's in good shape for the summer camp in July.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Summer camp goes by so fast! There's no time to take a "break".

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Good reply! Hehe… I'm looking forward to it… Summer camp ♪

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course, practice comes first, but…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Sometimes it's nice to take a break and "go out" to the beach!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: I'm sure it will refresh your horse girl and relieve her fatigue!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: It's only a short two months from July to August, but…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Please spend a fruitful "summer camp" with your horse girl.
Tazuna told me about the "summer camp"!
I should pay attention to <chrname>'s condition and energy to prepare for the camp…
It starts in two turns, in the first half of July, so we'd better start preparing now.
